area_name: Spirit Nebula aka. The Eagle Pillar!, The

climbs.name: The Green Flash
climbs.fa: FA. Alpine Monkeys FFA. Jordan Cannon

content.description:
Now that you have settled from the time warp it took to travel here, Get Ready!!!

The Green Flash is definitely one of the all time Super Cracks of the Area.That is if you are into perfect overhanging  finger cracks and yes this one also has three variation, all fracturing off in different directions like an insane green inverted lightening bolt!!!
content.protection: Standard rack to 3". Doubles in finger sized couldn't hurt.
content.location: Located on the steep green and black stripped North Face of The Spirit Nebula. Mirrored directly across canyon from The Mega Darwin Splitter!

pathTokens: Spirit Nebula aka. The Eagle Pillar!, The
